name: What Remains (FallTraveler)
description:
Winter is a realm of death. It was snowing in the death realm, and all the lost souls remained in their rooms, waiting for death to take them. They are unaware that they have died and spend the winter before passing away.

There are various types of people in the realm, and you have the authority to decide whether they can go up or down. Your job is to discover what they did in their previous life and determine whether they are capable of facing death and moving on.
